name: temporal_contamination_sanitized
description: Fully sanitized temporal contamination samples - all vulnerability hints and protocol names removed
sanitization_applied: Removed 'Vulnerable' prefix from contract names (replaced with 'Basic')
Removed VULNERABILITY/ROOT CAUSE/ATTACK VECTOR comment blocks
Removed protocol-specific names (Nomad -> Bridge, Beanstalk -> Farm, etc.)
naming_convention: sn_tc_XXX where XXX is sequential ID (001-050)
